overview: Memphis rappers Three 6 Mafia move to Tinseltown in this MTV reality series, which follows the guys as they pitch a film to a famous director, talk business with Ashton Kutcher, hot-tub with local hotties, party at the Playboy mansion and more. With their entourage in tow, the Southern boys take on Hollywood with their trademark high energy -- which they'll need to deal with the numerous distractions that threaten to derail their goals.
title: Three 6 Mafia: Adventures in Hollyhood
